column2:
purchases <- full_data %>% 
  filter(commodity_desc == "LUNCHMEAT") %>% 
  dplyr::select(household_key,quarter, brand) %>% 
  group_by(household_key,quarter, brand) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from =brand, values_from = n) %>% 
  mutate(Private = replace_na(Private,0)) %>% 
  ungroup()
